channel.title: Emps-scape 1000 Players!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2yzkg11.png[/img]
[b][size=5]Emps-Scape: the most popular private server with 700+ players online![/size][/b] [b][size=4]Created by thomy and Graham[/size][/b]
(posted this topic for thomy-13 as it wasn't working for him, the old thread's content was removed and wasn't posted by a staff member)[/center]
[b][size=4]1000 players!:[/size][/b]
We've reached 1000 players online!
The first pic is more accurate as it's updated every minute, the second pic is updated every 5 so only shows 1000 not 1028 :p.
[img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/1572/1000players.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Download:[/size][/b]
The desktop client can be downloaded at uppit: [b][url=http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO]http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO[/url][/b]. This is a 7 kilobyte jar file, when you run it it will automatically download the client and cache.
[b][size=4]Vote for Emps-Scape at Rune-Server:[/size][/b]
Vote for us on the Rune-Server toplist here: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/top.php?act=detail&sid=756]http://www.rune-server.org/top.php?act=detail&sid=756[/url].
[b][size=4]Features:[/size][/b]
[ul][*]One of the world's oldest and most popular private servers - over 700+ players online at peak times. We have been around for 4 years! [*]Extremely stable - no lag [*]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7 [*]A large and friendly player community [*]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations [*]Stable economy [*]Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow [*]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players [*]Explore our world which spans several RuneScape towns and dungeons [*]Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards [*]Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, jad and Emps-Wars [*]Holiday events (most recent was our Christmas 2009 event) [*]Full music and sound system in the client [*]Fullscreen client, resizable while playing [*]Working highscores on our website (URL to this is ingame as we are not allowed to advertise it here) [*]Regular content updates [*]17 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting [*]and even more!!...[/ul]
[b][size=4]Screenshots:[/size][/b]
[b]Challenge other players in the duel arena:[/b] [img]http://emps-scape.net/ss/duel6.png[/img]
[b]Explore vast dungeons and find thousands of monsters to kill:[/b] [img]http://emps-scape.net/ss/tav4.png[/img]
[b]Kill various bosses and earn glory and rewards:[/b] [img]http://emps-scape.net/ss/ice5.png[/img]
[b]Buy and sell your goods in Falador:[/b] [img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/8474/emps2.png[/img]
[b]Fight other players in the wilderness:[/b] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/3441/emps.png[/img]
[b]Barbarian Village: the starting town of Emps:[/b] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/9813/emps3.png[/img]
[b]Fight mighty bosses:[/b] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/4975/emps4.png[/img]
[b]Visit a variety of towns:[/b] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/848/emps6.png[/img]
[b]Explore forgotten dungeons:[/b] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/6581/emps7.png[/img]
[b]Form a team in Emps-Wars:[/b] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/1439/emps8.png[/img]
[b]Battle the other team's castle in Emps-Wars:[/b] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/7508/emps10.png[/img]
[b]Exchange Emps-Wars tickets for items:[/b] [img]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/5746/emps9.png[/img]
[b]Become a donator member for exclusive features, such as access to Al-Kharid:[/b] [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5904/emps5.png[/img]
[b][size=4]Staff team:[/size][/b]
[ul][*][b]thomy:[/b] (thomy-13 on rune-server) founder/owner, client and server programmer [*][b]Graham:[/b] server stability and lead website development [*][b]Nour:[/b] website development and staff management [*][b]Highstats:[/b] forum management[/ul]
Other administrators and moderators can be identified by their crown, and there is a list on our forum (unfortunately we cannot link to that here due to advertising rules, but you can find it ingame).
[b][size=4]Start your adventure today:[/size][/b]
Download and play Emps-Scape now, for free, at [b][url=http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO]http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO[/url][/b].

item.title: Emps-scape 1000 Players!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

No advertising, and i’ve bumped him up to a mute.

krackkid:

^One more for Frell to lock, stupid adverts…http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php for this.

Thank you my cheerleader

Read full topic

item.title: Emps-scape 1000 Players!
item.dc:creator: @every1thing every1thing
item.description:
@every1thing wrote:

[center]

2yzkg11.png700×170

[size=5]Emps-Scape: the most popular private server with 700+ players online![/size]
[size=4]Created by thomy and Graham[/size]

(posted this topic for thomy-13 as it wasn’t working for him, the old thread’s content was removed and wasn’t posted by a staff member)[/center]

[size=4]1000 players!:[/size]

We’ve reached 1000 players online!

The first pic is more accurate as it’s updated every minute, the second pic is updated every 5 so only shows 1000 not 1028 :p.

[size=4]Download:[/size]

The desktop client can be downloaded at uppit: http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO. This is a 7 kilobyte jar file, when you run it it will automatically download the client and cache.

[size=4]Vote for Emps-Scape at Rune-Server:[/size]

Vote for us on the Rune-Server toplist here: http://www.rune-server.org/top.php?act=detail&sid=756.

[size=4]Features:[/size]

[ul][]One of the world’s oldest and most popular private servers - over 700+ players online at peak times. We have been around for 4 years!
[]Extremely stable - no lag
[]Hosted on a dedicated server - online 24/7
[]A large and friendly player community
[]Flawless combat system - perfect timing, animations and calculations
[]Stable economy
[]Challenging experience rate - not too fast or too slow
[]Battle in the wilderness with hundreds of players
[]Explore our world which spans several RuneScape towns and dungeons
[]Challenge many bosses and obtain rewards
[]Several minigames, including duel arena, barrows, jad and Emps-Wars
[]Holiday events (most recent was our Christmas 2009 event)
[]Full music and sound system in the client
[]Fullscreen client, resizable while playing
[]Working highscores on our website (URL to this is ingame as we are not allowed to advertise it here)
[]Regular content updates
[]17 skills fully working - including fishing, cooking, slayer, crafting, herblore, mining, smithing, fletching and woodcutting
[]and even more!!..[/ul]

[size=4]Screenshots:[/size]

Challenge other players in the duel arena:

Explore vast dungeons and find thousands of monsters to kill:

Kill various bosses and earn glory and rewards:

Buy and sell your goods in Falador:

Fight other players in the wilderness:

Barbarian Village: the starting town of Emps:

Fight mighty bosses:

Visit a variety of towns:

Explore forgotten dungeons:

Form a team in Emps-Wars:

Battle the other team’s castle in Emps-Wars:

Exchange Emps-Wars tickets for items:

Become a donator member for exclusive features, such as access to Al-Kharid:

[size=4]Staff team:[/size]

[ul][]thomy: (thomy-13 on rune-server) founder/owner, client and server programmer
[]Graham: server stability and lead website development
[]Nour: website development and staff management
[]Highstats: forum management[/ul]

Other administrators and moderators can be identified by their crown, and there is a list on our forum (unfortunately we cannot link to that here due to advertising rules, but you can find it ingame).

[size=4]Start your adventure today:[/size]

Download and play Emps-Scape now, for free, at http://uppit.com/v/LATHGZCO.

Read full topic
